targets.query: uuid: $uuid AND (metricName.keyword: top3KubeletCPU OR metricName.keyword: kubeletCPU)
uuid: $uuid AND (metricName.keyword: top3KubeletMemory OR metricName.keyword: kubeletMemory)

panels.title: Top 5 Kubelet process RSS memory usage

targets.query: uuid: $uuid AND (metricName.keyword: top3CrioCPU OR metricName.keyword: crioCPU)
uuid: $uuid AND (metricName.keyword: top3CrioMemory OR metricName.keyword: crioMemory)

panels.title: Top 5 CRI-O process RSS memory usage

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podCPU" AND labels.node.keyword: $master AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podMemory" AND labels.node.keyword: $master AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podCPU" AND labels.node.keyword: "$worker" AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podMemory" AND labels.node.keyword: "$worker" AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid: $uuid AND metricName: txDroppedPackets AND labels.instance.keyword: $worker
uuid: $uuid AND metricName: rxDroppedPackets AND labels.instance.keyword: $worker
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podCPU" AND labels.node.keyword: $infra AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "podMemory" AND labels.node.keyword: $infra AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: master AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
list.label: Master nodes
list.name: master
list.query: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: master AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: worker AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
list.label: Worker nodes
list.name: worker
list.query: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: worker AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword",  "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: infra AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
list.label: Infra nodes
list.name: infra
list.query: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword",  "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: infra AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
